headline: Trump Bashes Brnovich, Will Endorse Other Senate Candidate
author: Katya Schwenk
sentences: The field of Republican candidates for this year's August 2 primary election includes Brnovich, businessman Jim Lamon, venture capitalist Blake Masters, former Arizona National Guard adjutant general Michael McGuire, and former state representative Justin Olson.
